text: Bregnano is a comune (municipality) in the Province of Como in the Italian region of Lombardy. It is about northwest of Milan and about south of Como. As of 31 March 2017, 6,466 people lived there. It has an area of 6.2 kmÂ². Bregnano is next to these municipalities: Cadorago, Cermenate, Lazzate, Lomazzo, Rovellasca. It has three churches called San Michele, San Giorgio and Santi Ippolito e Cassiano. == References == == Other websites == * Official website Category:Settlements in Como
title: Bregnano
